controls.name: malware_protection
findings: Cannot determine BitLocker status - may require admin privileges
recommendations: Run as Administrator to check encryption status
Consider enabling AppLocker or Windows Defender Application Control

controls.name: patch_management
recommendations: Run as Administrator to read hotfix history

controls.name: remote_work_mdm
findings: Device not joined to Azure AD
No VPN configured for remote work
recommendations: Enroll device in MDM for remote wipe capability (REQUIRED for CE 2025)
Join device to Azure AD for centralized management
Configure VPN for secure remote access (REQUIRED for CE 2025)
